channel.title: Lacking Natural Simplicity (Posts about urban fantasy)

item.title: Recent Reading: Mike Shevdon
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• The Road to Bedlam, The Courts of the Feyre, by Mike Shevdon; copyright 2010 by Shevdon Ltd.; ISBN 978-0-85766-061-09.

    The sequel to Sixty-one Nails.

item.title: Recent Reading: Jeaniene Frost
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• First Drop of Crimson, by Jeaniene Frost; copyright 2010; ISBN 978-0-06-15322-3.

    A spin-off from her Night Huntress series; this one features Denise MacGregor and Spade.

item.title: Recent Reading: Jocelynn Drake
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Dawnbreaker, by Jocelynn Drake; copyright 2009; ISBN 978-0-06-154288-6.

    The third Dark Days book.

  • Pray for Dawn, by Jocelynn Drake; copyright 2010; ISBN 978-0-06-185180-3.

    The fourth Dark Days1 book.

item.title: Recent Reading: Stacia Kane
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description: • Demon Inside, by Stacia Kane; copyright 2009 by Stacey Fackler; ISBN 978-1-4391-5507-3.

item.title: Recent Reading: Diana Rowland
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Secrets of the Demon, by Diana Rowland; copyright 2011; ISBN 978-0-7564-0652-3.

    An intriguing mix of police procedural and fantasy in Louisiana, featuring homicide detective Kara Gillian.

item.title: Recent Reading: Karen Chance
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Embrace the Night, by Karen Chance; copyright 2008; ISBN 979-0-451-46199-5.

    The fourth novel in the Cassie Palmer series.

item.title: Recent Reading: J. N. Duncan
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Deadworld, by J. N. Duncan; copyright 2011; ISBN 978-0-7582-5566-2.

    FBI agent Jackie Rutledge investigates a case involving P.I. Nick Anderson.

item.title: Recent Reading: Lucy A. Snyder
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description: • Spellbent, by Lucy A. Snyder. The main character is Jessie Shimmer.

item.title: Recent Reading: Devon Monk
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Magic to the Bone, by Devon Monk. The main character is Allie Beckstrom.

  • Magic in the Blood, by Devon Monk

item.title: Recent Reading: Kate Griffin
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• A Madness of Angels, by Catherine Webb writing as Kate Griffin. The main character is Matthew Swift.

  • The Midnight Mayor, by Catherine Webb writing as Kate Griffin
